title: Step Aside, Minimalism—the Floral Swimsuit Is Way Cooler Than You Think
description: The poolside look has never looked fresher.

html:
Black & White

Ulla Johnson Naomi Ruched Bikini Top

Neutral vibes, but may it floral. This swimsuit is the perfect option when you want something that’s as versatile as your standard black two-piece but with a bit more visual texture.

Sizes: P-L

Colors: White Gardenia

Wild Flowers

Zimmermann Lucky Mini Triangle Bikini

There’s a reason the string bikini remains an essential silhouette year after year. The floral print on this one feels unexpected without being over-the-top. No doubt, you can wear it again and again.

Sizes: 2-10

Colors: Blue Floral Bouquet

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Subtle Ruffles

Agua by Agua Bendita Kiwi Floral Bikini Top

Agua by Agua Bendita never misses—just take a look at this style. The brand’s feminine and floral designs will remain in your summer wardrobe for years to come.

Sizes: XS-XL

Colors: Canna

Supportive Choice

Monday Swimwear Sausalito One Piece

Supportive floral one-pieces always deserve a spot in your suitcase—especially ones that double as bodysuits. Versatile and cute, this swimsuit is a must-have for anyone.

Sizes: Petite-Very Very Voluptuous

Colors: Sunrise Floral

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Flower Power

SAME Island Triangle Top

Whether you’re embracing Guava Girl Summer or simply love the aesthetic, you need this swimsuit. I can practically smell the scent of sunscreen and see the crystal blue waters now.

Sizes: XS-2XL

Colors: 6 options

Effortless Botanicals

Peony Solstice Floral Bikini Top

This will be an unexpected hit in your lineup. The watercolor-inspired floral print is reason enough to pack it for your next adventure.

Sizes: XS-XL

Colors: Isles

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Simple One-Piece

Good American Satin Deep Dive One Piece

Sometimes, less is more—and in this case, it’s a single flower. If you lean toward one-pieces, this is the suit for you.

Sizes: XS-3XL

Colors: Champagne Tropical Hibiscus

A Touch Tropical

FARM Rio Blue Floral Cascade Bikini Top

As the quintessential summerwear brand, FARM Rio delivers some of the best floral swimsuits on the market. This one might be my favorite, thanks to its vibrant blue print and navy trim.

Sizes: XS-XL

Colors: Blue Floral Cascade Off-White

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Feeling Floral

La DoubleJ Honey Top

Bright orange florals pop this bandeau-style suit from La DoubleJ. It’s a statement-making option in the best way.

Sizes: XS-XL

Colors: Morpheus Orange

Cool Twist

Follow Suit Flora One Piece

For a fresh take on florals, consider a swimsuit with cutouts. It’s an unexpected spin on the trend.

Sizes: XS-XL

Colors: 7 options

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Blue Hue

Solid & Striped Lolita Bikini Top Blue Ditsy Floral

Who doesn’t love a ditsy floral pattern? This feminine print is a perfect choice for your next bikini—especially if you’re into a coquette-inspired look. The delicate blue blooms echo ocean hues beautifully.

Sizes: XS-XL

Colors: Ditsy Floral

Elevated Option

Tom Ford Floral-Print Buckle Triangle Bikini Set

Yes, you can have a floral swimsuit and still channel the timelessness of your black bikini. If you’re planning to be in your beach ’fit all day long, this would look chic paired with a flowy skirt or sarong as your cover-up.

Sizes: S-L

Colors: Combo Black

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Seasonably Bright

Tory Burch Floral Swimsuit

Summer isn’t summer without a reliable one-piece. This suit offers just the right mix of coverage and style—so you can leave your worries at home on your next getaway.

Sizes: XS-XL

Colors: Pink

Something Different

Asta Resort Lio Jacquard Bikini Top

Far from a traditional swimsuit, you’ll want to add this retro-inspired number to your collection—and stat. It brings the floral vibes—all summer long.

Sizes: XS-L

Colors: Pink Delilah Sequin

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Always Reliable

Frankies Bikinis Cola Underwire Bikini Top

When you're searching for a brand with endless swimsuit options, Frankies Bikinis always delivers. This floral one feels modern yet playful.

Sizes: XS-2XL

Colors: 10 options

Why Trust ELLE

Every product featured on ELLE.com is independently researched, tested, or editor-approved. We only recommend products that we stand behind, and the merchandise featured on our site is always driven by editorial and product testing standards, not by affiliate deals or advertising relationships. Any content created in partnership with advertisers is marked as such.
